title: CE41621: Prestressed Concrete - Quick Facts
text:
CE41621
Course name | Prestressed Concrete
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Concept on Mechanics; Materials; Properties of sections; Stress analysis three methods; Prestressing and Post stressing; Beam design - no tension and ultimate; Poles and slab panels; Loss assessment; Composite beams; Design for shear. Large span structures; Structural forms and design principles; Special materials, open web and built-up structures
